verses.content: Ka naupa, ka thuhai hi i pawm a, Nangmaa ka thupêkhai hi i siekhâwl a,
Chuonga varna tienga i na chu i sit a, Hrietthiemna tienga i lungril chu i hmang chun;
Anih, ngairuotdikna chu i ko a, Hrietthiemna koa i râwl în suo bawk a,
Tangka anga i zawng a, Ro phûm rûkhai anga i zawng suok chun;
LALPA ṭitna chu hung hre tâng i ta, Pathien hrietna chu hmu suok tâng i tih.
LALPA chun varna a pêk sih a; A baua inthawk chun hrietna le hrietthiemna hung suok a tih.
Mi tluong ta ding chun varna hrisêl chu a siekhâwl a; Lungril ṭhataka fetuhai ta ding chun phaw a nih.
Rorêlna lampuihai chu a vênghim theina ding le, A mi inthienghai lampui chu a vawngṭhatna dingin.
Chun, rorêlna le felna chu hung hrethiem tâng i ta, Thlierbîk nei nawna chu, anih, lampui ṭha tinrêng el le chun.
Varna chu i lungrila chun hung lût a ta, I hringna ta ding chun hrietna chu inhawitina nîng a tih.
Ngairuot thiemna chun nangma chu vêng a ti cheh a, Hrietthiemna chun kawl tlat a ti che;
Mi rilo lampuia inthawka sansuok ding che le, Thil khawhlohai hriltuhaia inthawka sansuok ding chein;
Inthimna lampui hraw dinga, Felna lampuihai nghatsantuhaia inthawk le,
Rîtlona thaw kawnga hlimtuhai, Mi rilo khawhlonaa lâwm hlaktuhaia inthawk le,
An lampuihaia mi kâwihai, An lampuihai pêtsantuhaia inthawkin.
Hmêlmak nuhmeia inthawka sansuok ding chein, A bâuthluma zaihlêmtu che, ram dang mi ngeia inthawk chun;
A tleirâwl lai ṭhien chu nghatsan a, A Pathien thuthlung theinghiltua inthawk chun.
A in chun thina chu ân nghâi zing a, A lampuihai chu thinaah:
A mânu kuoma fetu chu tukhawm an hung kîr nâwk ta nawh a, Hringna lampuihai khawm chu an pâw phâk ngai bawk nawh;
Mi ṭhahai lampui chu i hraw theina ding le, Mi fel lampuihai chu i hraw theina dingin.
Mi tluong chu rama chun chêng a ta, Mi ṭha famkim chu a um zing ding a ni sih a.
Nisienlakhawm, mi khawhlo chu rama inthawka sât thlâk nîng a ta, Bawsetuhai chu amaa inthawk chun zunga phawi hmangin um an tih.
